member.name: DispatcherQueueOptions
member.summary: Specifies the threading and apartment type for a new DispatcherQueueController.

member.name: DispatcherQueueOptions.threadType
member.summary: Thread affinity for the created DispatcherQueueController.

member.name: DispatcherQueueOptions.apartmentType
member.summary: Specifies whether to initialize COM apartment on the new thread as an application single-threaded apartment (ASTA) or single-threaded apartment (STA). This field is only relevant if threadType is DQTYPE_THREAD_DEDICATED. Use DQTAT_COM_NONE when DispatcherQueueOptions.threadType is DQTYPE_THREAD_CURRENT.
